text: by weight also for the candlesticks of gold, and for the lamps thereof, of gold, by weight for every candlestick and for the lamps thereof; and for the candlesticks of silver, <FI>silver<Fi> by weight for <FI>every<Fi> candlestick and for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick;
name: I Chronicles 28:15
